p:
In spite of lukewarm in-vitro and in-silico outcomes, an ongoing clinical study on TFV (ChiCTR2000029468), expected to end in June 2020, aims at assessing the effect of the combination Tenofovir + emtricitabine (cytidine analogue) related to LPV/r in COVID-19 patients.
130 In addition to the efficacy of treatment, clinical trials can validate the prevalence of adverse effects related to the toxicity of TFV in patients. TFV is also a powerful nephrotoxic drug causing damage to proximal tubular cells. In spite of that, interrupting the treatment is sufficient to improve adverse effects, which makes monitoring of patients essential.
144
